title: "The adults have let us down": Florida students demand stricter gun laws
text:
"The adults have let us down": Florida students demand stricter gun laws 2:12am IST - 00:58 
Speaking on CBS' ''Face the Nation'' program, Florida school shooting survivor Emma Gonzalez says students will march next month in Washington because she says ''the adults have let us down.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Speaking on CBS' "Face the Nation" program, Florida school shooting survivor Emma Gonzalez says students will march next month in Washington because she says "the adults have let us down."
